1). Are all 12 units residential or commercial property? ABSD only applicable to residential properties.2). Is the person owned the 12 units of residential properties under single name?3). Are all 12 units of property located in Singapore? ABSD is not applicable to overseas property.4).  Did he bought the units 20 years ago before ABSD was introduced or before Trust/company entity also attract ABSD?Above are the questions you need to ask.I saw people owning multiple properties but after checking the details  it is multiple commercial and industrial properties. About S$300k each.
